overview: Based on the legenday cult Japanese comic “Stop The Bitch Campaign” by Hideo Yamamoto (“Ichi the Killer”) and Tetsuya Koshiba (“Remote”), a fierce battle between the beautiful high-school girls and the middle-aged man erupts once again.
tagline: A reboot of the cult movies & manga “Stop The Bitch Campaign” series.
title: Stop the Bitch Campaign Reboot
